input_text.Prompt:
Using the item features and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Hercules LS234H Type II 225-Pound Duty Rated Multi-Position Ladder System, 13-Foot,Hercules,LS234H" />

Item features:
Meets all applicable OSHA requirements
Exclusive Patented Stainless Steel Hinge Locks
Exclusive Integrated Anti-Twist Truss brace Supports
Super Lightweight
Meets or Exceeds All Applicable Requirements of the American National Standards Institute ANSI
input_text.Response A:
Attention: Hercules multipurpose ladder system
Interest: This ladder system is very safe, sturdy, and reliable.
Desire: I want to own this ladder system for my home.
Action: Click “Add to Cart” to purchase the Hercules multipurpose ladder system.
input_text.Response B: The Hercules LS234H Type II 225-Pound Duty Rated Multi-Position Ladder System is a 13-foot ladder system that is super lightweight and easy to use.  It features an exclusive patented stainless steel hinge lock that keeps the ladder from twisting.  The integrated anti-twist brace supports the ladder as it is extended and provides extra support.  The ladder system meets or exceeds all applicable requirements of the American National Standards Institute ANSI.

label_annotations.feedback:
Response A has taken the action too literally, it has detailed it rather than written a piece like Response B has.

Response B has made an interesting summary following the correct structure that was asked for.
